actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives concerning the issuance and renewal of certain student visas.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Department of State, along with the United States Information Agency, shall maintain a consistent policy concerning the granting, modification, and renewal of student visas, without regard to the countries of origin of the foreign student applicants.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives concerning the issuance and renewal of certain student visas.
